successes.title: Mini Museum
successes.description: Billions of years of life, science and history in the palm of your hand!  Curated, handcrafted, and artfully arranged for display and wonder!

Pledges.description: PURE LOVE. Backers at this level receive the undying gratitude of Hans Fex and a "Thank You For Your Support Of Mini Museum" video viewable on Youtube.  Your name will scroll across the video in recognition of your donation.
LIMITED EDITION T-SHIRT. In appreciation of your continued support, backers at the $20 level will receive a limited edition T-shirt with an awesome TBA design inspired by the mini museum.
EARLY BIRD SPECIAL! Limited Edition SMALL MINI MUSEUM (containing 11 specimens) and a detailed online companion booklet.
SMALL MINI MUSEUM (containing 11 specimens). Limited Edition. Includes a detailed online companion booklet.
SMALL MINI MUSEUM (containing 11 specimens). Limited Edition. Includes a detailed online companion booklet.
EARLY BIRD - MEDIUM MINI MUSEUM (22 Specimens). Limited Edition. Includes all specimens in the Small mini museum plus 11 more, as well as a detailed online companion booklet.
MEDIUM MINI MUSEUM (22 Specimens). Limited Edition. Includes all specimens in the Small mini museum plus 11 more, as well as a detailed online companion booklet.

EARLY BIRD SPECIAL! LARGE MINI MUSEUM (33 Specimens). Limited Edition. Includes all specimens in both the Small and Medium mini museums plus 11 more, as well as a detailed online companion booklet. One of those pieces is a surprise 'MYSTERY SPECIMEN' which will only be revealed when you receive your mini museum.

LARGE MINI MUSEUM (33 Specimens). Limited edition. Includes all specimens in both the Small and Medium mini museums plus 11 more, as well as a detailed online companion booklet. One of those pieces is a surprise 'MYSTERY SPECIMEN' which will only be revealed when you receive your mini museum.

LARGE MINI MUSEUM (33 Specimens). Limited edition. Includes all specimens in both the Small and Medium mini museums plus 11 more, as well as a detailed online companion booklet. One of those pieces is a surprise 'MYSTERY SPECIMEN' which will only be revealed when you receive your mini museum.

LARGE MINI MUSEUM (33 Specimens). Limited edition. Includes all specimens in both the Small and Medium mini museums plus 11 more, as well as a detailed online companion booklet. One of those pieces is a surprise 'MYSTERY SPECIMEN' which will only be revealed when you receive your mini museum. Estimated delivery is September 2014.

THIS IS THE FINAL TIER WE WILL BE OFFERING FOR LARGE MINI MUSEUM (33 Specimens). Limited edition. Includes all specimens in both the Small and Medium mini museums plus 11 more, as well as a detailed online companion booklet. One of those pieces is a surprise 'MYSTERY SPECIMEN' which will only be revealed when you receive your mini museum. Estimated delivery is November 2014.

LARGE MINI MUSEUM (33 Specimens) AND A "TOUCH" VERSION OF MINI MUSEUM. Limited Edition. In addition to the Large mini museum you also get a beautiful wooden case with 33 small containers - each with every specimen as they have been prepared for placement into a mini museum! You can remove them from their containers and touch, study, and admire them however you wish! Includes all specimens in both the Small and Medium mini museums plus 11 more, as well as a detailed online companion booklet. One of those pieces is a surprise 'MYSTERY SPECIMEN' which will only be revealed when you receive your mini museum.

COLLECTORS SET OF ALL THREE MINI MUSEUMS. Limited Edition. Includes one each of the Small mini museum (11 Specimens), one of the Medium mini museum (22 Specimens), and one of the Large mini museum (33 Specimens), as well as a detailed online companion booklet. One of those pieces is a surprise 'MYSTERY SPECIMEN' which will only be revealed when you receive your mini museum.

LARGE MINI MUSEUM (33 Specimens) AND A "TOUCH" VERSION OF MINI MUSEUM. Limited Edition. In addition to the Large mini museum you also get a beautiful wooden case with 33 small containers - each with every specimen as they have been prepared for placement into a mini museum! You can remove them from their containers and touch, study, and admire them however you wish! Includes all specimens in both the Small and Medium mini museums plus 11 more, as well as a detailed online companion booklet. One of those pieces is a surprise 'MYSTERY SPECIMEN' which will only be revealed when you receive your mini museum.

COLLECTORS SET OF ALL THREE MINI MUSEUMS. Limited Edition. Includes one each of the Small mini museum (11 Specimens), one of the Medium mini museum (22 Specimens), and one of the Large mini museum (33 Specimens), as well as a detailed online companion booklet. One of those pieces is a surprise 'MYSTERY SPECIMEN' which will only be revealed when you receive your mini museum.

PERSONALIZED VISIT. Come to Washington DC (airfare and travel to Hans not included) and spend the day with the incredibly talented, always interesting and forever humble maker of the mini museum, Hans Fex. Explore his collection in person and enjoy lunch and/or dinner with Hans and his family. You will also hand craft your own Large (33 specimen) version of the mini museum at his home during this visit.

SMITHSONIAN TOUR AND CRAFT YOUR OWN MINI MUSEUM IN PERSON.  A one of a kind personalized tour for 2 consecutive days in Washington DC visiting the Smithsonian and other area attractions/museums of your choosing.  Dinner with Hans and his family.  While at Hans' house, you will construct your own personalized version of the mini museum on the spot. You are welcome to bring a friend. You must supply your own transport to Washington, DC and hotel with this reward.
